'''Tebe''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A young Huana woman employed by the [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) as a greeter, Tebe's job is to greet newcomers to the colonial outpost and give them the lay of the land. She isn't particularly thrilled about the job, so she amuses herself by tormenting the [undersecretary](/undersecretary/) supposed to ensure she greets newcomers like a proper Rauataian would.

## Interactions

* She provides greeting services and an introduction to the relations in Sayuka.
}}
